revised_title: Mixed Substrate Utilization Strategies in Microorganisms
tldr: This article discusses the strategies of mixed substrate utilization in microorganisms, focusing on their growth in the presence of diverse substrates. It highlights the control mechanisms governing the utilization of various substrates and the significance of mixed substrate utilization in microbial competition in nutrient-limited natural environments. The article also explores different responses of bacteria to mixed substrate utilization and the metabolic events underlying this process.
